fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 61.25 points or 0.33% to settle at 18,816.70. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 0.82% to 11.13. HDFC Asset Management Company, ICICI Bank, HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
